summary: 用户完成操作后实时更新CDP人群
description: 用户完成操作后实时更新CDP人群

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/insurance/syncCDP')
request.add_api_parameter("userToken", "gQk/8THS7TSQlVj42JP1lg==")
request.add_api_parameter("bizCode", "NCD")
request.add_api_parameter("serviceName", "marketplace")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/insurance/syncCDP')
request.add_api_param('userToken', 'gQk/8THS7TSQlVj42JP1lg==')
request.add_api_param('bizCode', 'NCD')
request.add_api_param('serviceName', 'marketplace')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: success
schema.description: 接口成功=true接口失败=true 系统失败=false

schema.name: resultCode
schema.description: 业务成功=SUCCESS 业务失败=SUCCESS 系统失败=SYSTEM_ERROR

schema.name: resultMessage
schema.description: 接口成功=Success 接口失败=Success 系统失败=System Error

schema.name: data
schema.description: 业务成功=true业务失败=false系统失败=false
